__e: You see, 'cause I just spoke to Lester... no more than 10 minutes ago.
And that's because we both believe... Lester couldn't have had anything to do with this murder.
Lester, you don't do that very well, so I know all about that, too.
My name is Lester, and I'm gonna ask you a couple more questions.
Listen, I know it's not my case, but I'd like your permission to go back to Lester's house and see what he has to say.
What me and Lester do mightn't seem fair, but that doesn't make it against the law.
